011

Point of Reference Website

Portfolio website for a design studio based in Madrid: Point of Reference, a studio that combines graphic design and architecture. The responsive website was created with a very clean approach focused on the projects: a drop-down menu, always in sight, where you can find all their work, from identity to temporary architecture and signage. The client has modified the website designed in 2020.

012

“Si esto es el Paraíso” Domestika Course

fieldsclean.desc_a: Portfolio website for a design studio based in Madrid: Point of Reference, a studio that combines graphic design and architecture.
fieldsclean.desc: Portfolio website for a design studio based in Madrid: Point of Reference, a studio that combines graphic design and architecture. The responsive website was created with a very clean approach focused on the projects: a drop-down menu, always in sight, where you can find all their work, from identity to temporary architecture and signage. The client has modified the website designed in 2020.

acf.desc_a: Interactive website for Google Gemini, introducing their new AI era through an engaging digital experience.

Website environment for Banjo, a sound design studio based in Valencia. They present us with a concise brief: translate the new brand identity into a renewed portfolio site where both visuals and sounds hold equal importance.
A digital platform for knowledge and innovation that was born, after the pandemic, as an initiative of Fuego Camina Conmigo's Agency, to connect differently with its brands.

A festival based in Berlin that showcases amazing works in music videos, short films and commercials. We aimed to create an interface with smooth interactions that complement the festival’s essence while keeping the visuals at the forefront.

An original website that represents the school’s attitude while ensuring that its objectives aren’t overlooked: prioritizing a user experience that integrates both content and form while offering engaging interactions.

A fun and interactive multipurpose portfolio for Kids Agency, representing their playful attitude and showcasing all their projects, services and content generated by themself, such as the look or shop pages.

A digital environment for Paya Health, a new brand of health supplements based in Los Angeles. The new e-commerce design reflects the brand's energy and vitality through the use of vibrant colors and shapes.
Through a website with a strong presence of white spaces and images, we give rise to a dialogue and a dynamism that is felt throughout the experience.
Landing page designed for Plusminus, a product by Vibia. The new design allows for a comprehensive exploration of the product and its variations through the use of big typography and imagery.

With a minimalist approach and to let the images speak for themselves, we built a website that had a strong presence of white space and large images, using subtle interactions to create a smooth web experience.
Portfolio website for a design studio based in Madrid: Point of Reference, a studio that combines graphic design and architecture.

rel_1.title: “Si esto es el Paraíso” Domestika Course

acf.desc_a: To inspire my Domestika Course students to create a unique web experience, I created this project where I share my experience as a Canarian outside of the Canary Islands. In the project I used some visual imagery of a tourist place: the postcard and the souvenir., translating both into an interactive experience.

For March 8th, as women reclaim the streets, we have decided to revitalize Debora Rodam's project from 2020, making use of powerful photographs and messages of the initiative but this time in a web context, where the project takes on another dimension with movement.

A visual diary designed during lockdown to experiment with aesthetic trends. I posted these experiments on Instagram and then created a website to bring them together for self-promotion and aesthetic experience.
